key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including fines and ongoing scrutiny
Economic instability due to inflation and currency devaluation
Operational inefficiencies and customer service issues
controversies: Multi-million dollar fine for anti-competitive practices (later annulled)
Fined 150 million Argentine pesos for abuse of dominant position
Persistent customer complaints about service quality and billing errors
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction due to poor service and support
Failure to deliver purchased products, harming customer trust
governance_issues: Dividend distribution strategy using bonds, signaling financial pressures
